website_summaries.verdict: A trusted brand that's often recommended by veterinarians and a recipe that has earned praise by many dog owners for the results it provides in their pets' diets.
pros: Known to produce weight loss in dogs when fed according to directions
Most dogs are attracted to the flavor
Contains antioxidants, whole grains, and chicken as the first ingredient
Doesn't have preservatives or artificial ingredients
cons: Contains some animal by-product and fillers, but is balanced with lots of high-quality ingredients
Some reports of loose stools until dogs get use to eating it

customer_reviews.title: Even if this was bad batch, the manufacturer will not step up to ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give it zero stars. Dog was critically ill and hospitalized two weeks for liver issues. Sent sample to NPL labs to confirm high toxicity in food. Currently in legal battle with manufacturer to recoup medical costs. Lab recovered after two weeks of not eating this food. Even if this was bad batch, the manufacturer will not step up to plate. Amazing, dog sick while eating the food and got better when we stopped. Lab confirmed toxicity. Now they'll use unlimited resources to squash the little guy. No accountability at all. Sad..We're out thousands and almost lost our lab. Using Fromm for weight management now.
customer_reviews.author: emmitsuks

customer_reviews.title: Great for weight loss!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our boxer loves this stuff. Got the small bites once too and he devours it. We add water because I guess it tastes better- it's how he liked his old food as well, and he's getting older. In any case, he was overweight which not helping his arthritis, so at 82# he started on this- 1 1/2 cups twice a day. He's down to 70# now 8 mos later.... which might be a little too much weight loss. Heh, we'll increase or maybe mix it with wet stuff or half and half with regular? Not sure yet, but it definitely lightened him up. I need this diet personally.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sah

customer_reviews.title: Tasha likes it
customer_reviews.text: My 100 lb., 10 year old, Heinz 57 needs to lose about 10 lbs. She can be finicky but she loves Hills Science Diet Perfect weight adult. It also got a 3.5 on dogfoodadvisor.com which means its probably better than most of the stuff I eat. The velcro closer on the bag is also very convenient. There are 2 different feeding scales on the bag. One for losing weight and one for maintaining weight. I have to admit that I haven't actually measured it out so I couldn't really rate its effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: William V

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Not the same recipe anymore :(
customer_reviews.text: The package advertises "Tasty New Kibble" and is definitely new since the last package I had was the same great stuff. THIS IS NO LONGER GREAT The kibble size is even smaller and it smells totally different the the original recipe, and you can literally see that it is overcooked on on side of just about EVERY piece. It doesn't taste the same either and you know how I know???? I asked my dog (just kidding; I'm not that crazy)......I tasted it myself: it's overdone and no longer the product it once was. I'm very disappointed and will not be ordering it again
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Has changed our pack’s lives
customer_reviews.text: Before this food our dogs were overweight and starting to get hurt too often. Now after eating this for several months they are slim and active! They jump on the couch and in the car happily now. Our dogs are all about 7 and we needed to change their diets now for their health in old age. This food is so perfect because the dogs love it and they look so great now. They love the food too, they haven’t gotten tired of it yet and they used to get finicky over time with other foods. So grateful for this food!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Reed M.

customer_reviews.title: do not buy it.
customer_reviews.text: dogs do not like it......will not touch it.....it appears tone a scam
customer_reviews.author: Doug Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Doggo has lost weight!
customer_reviews.text: My dog needed to lose ~15lbs according to the vet. She recommended this as it is what she feeds her dog. It is a bit pricey so I wasn't sure at first, but now my sweet golden boy has lost >10 pounds, looks and feels great! He has much more energy and I think he likes the food, although he loves all food haha. I wish it were a little less expensive, but the results are priceless. Hopefully my pup will live a longer healthier life as a result. Also, he poops a lot more on this food! So I know it is high fiber and is good for his gut. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Previously loved it, not after the kibble size change
customer_reviews.text: We had been feeding this to our Golden Retriever - he has had surgery for elbow displaysia in both elbows and keeping him at a lean weight is very important. We opened the new bag end of Aug 2020 and the new kibble size is ridiculous for large breeds, this is the size of small dog kibble or cat food. The old size he would actually have to chew - this he just vacuums up in about 20 seconds in a slow feed bowl. Hills come on, you advertise this with a Golden Retriever on the front. It seems you’ve also changed the kibble size on most of your other large breed advertised food.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Our Bostons Love it 🐶🐶🐕🐕🐕
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boston terriers. They really like it and they stopped gulping and started chewing their food. They all eat at a slower pace and actually taste it. My little guy is now back to 17lbs where he belongs. Still working on our newest rescue Hank who was very large and a work in progress. He's however losing and not to fast.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dog food
customer_reviews.text: I was weary from all the negative feedback but I decided to try it anyway based on the positive ones ... yesssss it works .. my 8 year old golden retriever was 90 lbs which is about a 10-15 lb over weight for her breed ... she’s lost a few lbs within the 3 weeks of her being on this new diet .. not only that she’s more energetic and her poop is perfect consistency... she use to sometimes be constipated from her previous food 🥘... but she loves this food and it definitely work with her weight problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New Kibble size is TERRIBLE for my large dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have used Adult Perfect Weight Dog Food for my dogs for almost 7 years. It had been wonderful. Now with this new really small kibble they struggle to eat it. Much of it falls out of their mouth. Both of my dogs are quite large at ~130 lbs each. These bits are way too small for them. After all this time, I unfortunately, am now going to need to change product and brands. It USED to be a great product and maybe it is OK for little to medium size adult dogs but certainly not for large ones.
customer_reviews.author: G. Wisniewski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for weight loss and maintenance
customer_reviews.text: Top quality dog food for weight loss and weight maintenance. I have 2 dogs and one need to lose weight and one needed to maintain weight and it is/has been great for them. They are both now at their weight goal and the older dog acts like she is 3 again (she’s 8 now). They are both very active and this helps them maintain weight and they both love it. No feeding problems and the older one is very picky. Smells really weird not bad but not good but the seal on the bag is good and I guess the dogs love the smell which is really all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: They reduced the kibble size--why????
customer_reviews.text: We've bought Perfect Weight Adult for years but the bag I just got has "new formula" and the kibble is so small, it looks like rabbit food instead of dog food. It is so small, the dog doesn't have to chew it but instead swallows it. IF you are going to change this food, PLEASE have a normal kibble size (like you had) with an option for "small bites" for people with small dogs. We've loved this food but will have to find something else if they cannot change the kibble size to something chewable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Emory

customer_reviews.title: dog food shipped to the house
customer_reviews.text: Flavor ?? I'm not sampling this product, my dog is. she seems to enjoy it cause 15 seconds after putting in her dish, she scarfs down. it does omit an odd odor. Love that it has velcro on the seam to close and reopen the bag. price is right at the range if you would purchase this at a vet office. It was funny to see it come in a giant box though. my mailman had to hate me that day.But overall will order this again!
customer_reviews.author: Lolarabbit

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is nuts over this food! She gets really excited when it’s time to eat. Sometimes, she just goes into the laundry room and lays next to the bag. Sometimes she leads me there, even when it’s not time to eat. I’ve never bought food that she’s carried on about like this, and she’s always eaten vet recommended food. It’s so hard not to give her more than she gets! Will def buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Why do I even...

customer_reviews.title: Rating it 5 stars on behalf of my dog
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the real deal to us, at least. I found it via search on amazon, read the reviews and purchased and behold, my darling 12 year old lab mix, who had been enjoying her summer BBQs a bit too much, loved the stuff and not just that, she has lost about 10 pounds total and looks great. I wish I could find something that would do that for me. :) I also like the high quality bag, the velcro closure and frankly, I think it smells better than most dog kibble.
customer_reviews.author: Ulrike

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works. My dogs has lost the weight as prescribed by the vet just by switching to this Perfect Weight variety. update: 04/28/2017 - And it continues to work. My female Border Collie is down to 52lbs from 59lb at her heaviest. (Her brother isnt happy since he didnt need to loose weight but they will eat from the same bowl)
customer_reviews.author: Caledonia

customer_reviews.title: Do not feed this to your dog
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write reviews but I feel compelled to write one about this dog food. Our vet recommended this food for our dog because she is overweight. Within days she was vomiting, drooling excessively and lethargic. We took her off of it and within a day and a half all symptoms stopped. I will never use this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: clavo

customer_reviews.title: Doggo loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended this for our dog, who he stated was a 9/9 of fat (yes, I know, it is awful). We were using a lab based name brand food, and our dog gained weight like crazy from it. Since he has been on this food, 1.1 cups in the AM and PM, he has lost about 4 lbs a month, which is awesome (he is a lab mix). He loves this food, and the bag is super nice with the Velcro opening and a thick lining. The food is clearly high quality.
customer_reviews.author: jl9988Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: DIabetic dog with wheat allergy - this works great
customer_reviews.text: My older dog became a diabetic and could not eat HIlls W/D since has wheat. Vet recommended this one and my older dogs loves it, eating less and losing weight. My other dog eats it no problem. Both a bit gassy at first due to high fiber but after a week or so now ok.
customer_reviews.author: SteveinSC

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Food inside the bag!!
customer_reviews.text: We have been feeding Science Diet dog food to our dogs for years! This brand was HIGHLY recommended by our vet years ago and still is today. We have been ordering it from Amazon recently and this time after selecting “Buy Again” we were sent a bag that looks 100% correct and like the last bag, but the food inside is itty-bitty-teeny-tiny. Not sure how this is going to work for our big Golden Retriever. A mistake was made somewhere with this one. But here we are, bag opened, dog needing fed, so I guess we’re stuck with something different than we ordered.☹️
customer_reviews.author: M. Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Bag contains the wrong product For his it’s labeled
customer_reviews.text: This us NOT the “adult size” kibble in this bag - it is the “mini” size we used to buy! I think there was a manufacturing/packaging error that put the small kibble on the wrong bags! Now I have 2 such bags - one opened the other not - and it’s not what we feed our dog! The one that’s not opened is going back and I will probably go to the PetSmart and buy it instead.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Kibble size is not what the package say. Different the last 3 times!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since the came out with the "NEW" packaging, each delivery has been different. First the kibble was small the next one was medium and the last one appears to be extra small. My dog is 125 lbs, he laps it up like water. No chewing involved. I'm going to look for a different distributor or a different brand. How sad is that.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly T

customer_reviews.title: My Vet is changing our dog over to this food, he recommends it for weight.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is transitioning over to this food and she loves it, no diarrhea and having good BM's, it is more expensive then the food she has been on, but her weight has increased so our Vet wanted us to change over. Comes in a zip lock top bag but the bag does not stay closed, I will be using the food container to dump it in when she is adjusted off her old food.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa

customer_reviews.title: Why has this suddenly gone to miniature size???
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased this for our small dachshund for some time. Now Amazon changed the default size to “small kibble” which she will just inhale. Why??? Makes absolutely no sense to predigest the pebble size when it comes to dieting. There are no other size options offered here, so I will have to look elsewhere. Sad but true.
customer_reviews.author: Ganymede

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine recommended this dog food to me and my pup loves it! She is quite a bit overweight and I needed to get it under control. This food has helped tremendously! My dog has been on this new diet for a little less than 2 months and I can already tell a big difference! I just followed the directions on the bag as to how much to feed her and it's working great! I'm so happy to see my dog is losing weight so she doesn't have health (or joint!) problems in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Heather M. Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for weight management!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog Zoey (beagle mix) has been on this food for just over a year, and has had great results from it. After adopting her, she gained a lot of weight and the vet recommended that we start feeding her this weight management food by Hill's Science. We got her this food and also purchased a maze bowl, which helps hinder dogs from eating too quickly. When we took her back for her bi-yearly visit with the vet, he was very happy with her weight loss! We use it now for weight management. She seems to love the taste!
customer_reviews.author: Marilee

customer_reviews.title: Dog's Like the Flavor of the Food
customer_reviews.text: Our four dogs have been eating the Science Diet Perfect Weight dog food for three weeks. They don't seem to have any problem with the usual bland taste of Science Diet dog food. My wife once had a dog who would rather starve for days than eat Science Diet dog food. Time will tell if the dogs lose any weight from eating the dog food on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: P.H.

customer_reviews.title: Love Hills!
customer_reviews.text: we have been using Hill's for our dogs for about 3-4 years now. i just switched to this flavor a couple of months ago and my dogs LOVE this flavor! my 55lb Coon hound lost 4 pounds already, and he seems to be more energetic. i can't believe it! the price is worth it for this brand. love Hills!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Kibble size changed, unsafe
customer_reviews.text: They have changed the formula for this food. We’ve been using this particular dog food for years, and now the kibble is TINY. Almost like puppy food. Not good for fast eaters, as it poses a potential choking risk. Will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Small kibble is dangerous
customer_reviews.text: This food has helped my Golden lose weight. I love the packaging and the velcro. But the small kibble is a big problem. Occasionally my girl stops eating and gags. It’s because she just inhaled the tiny kibble. For pete’s sake, this food is for large breeds. I am going to find another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff P.

customer_reviews.title: Labrador loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My labrador pyranese mix absolutely loves this food. I've also gotten him the light weight management food since he was about 10lbs over weight and he liked it, but preferentially ate this one if we mixed it. This one has a stronger smell of meat. I give him 5-6 cups a day and he did lose some weight (after switching from whole earth farms) and has kept it off for the last 4 or 5 months since we switched
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: My dogs LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to get my dog some food that would help them lose weight without putting them on a diet and this really did it! My dogs love this food and I really like how it is not that expensive as some other high quality brands out there. I did not realize how much my dogs loved this food until I bought a different brand and they did not want to it unless I mixed this into it. Glad I got this and I will continue ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Chang

customer_reviews.title: 10-15lb weight loss on my labrador
customer_reviews.text: My formerly grossly overweight yellow lab has lost about ten pounds on this food. It took about 2 months to see a difference but the weight just fell right off of her once the weight loss started. She loves the taste, too. the food seems to be filling for her. I think she's probably lost up to 15 lbs now. She was 110 before we started!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Good but Pricey
customer_reviews.text: My bassets do well on Hill's Science Diet. I've used the Light formula for several years and trimmed 8-10 pounds off my chow hounds. They love the taste, so I tried the Perfect Weight formula now that their weight is where it should be. This variety was a more expensive than the light formula $33 as opposed to $26 on Prime), but what I didn't realize until later is that the bag is also 2 1/2 pounds lighter. I've gone back to the Light variety, still a great product but far less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Rita MacLean

customer_reviews.title: Apparently the food tastes great, my dog lost weight!
customer_reviews.text: My dog ate this food immediately and lost weight over the following months! He has bad knees and needed to loose a little weight and this food worked great. Since he already ate a Hill Science Diet dry food it was a smooth transition to this weight management formula. I did follow the instructions about gradually mixing his old food with this new formula so there were not any tummy problems!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: my dog needed grain free and my vet recommended this to us. while we absolutely loved it, and it helped my lazy pup lose 1.5 lbs in just a year, it's getting to be too spendy. we found another grain free food we switched to, but this one really is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I received wrong product, but will try it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Adult Perfect Weight Dog Food, 28.5 lb bag which my two mini Aussies have been on for the past year and have done well. I received a 30lb bag of Science Diet Sensitive Skin and Stomach; however, since the food does have good reviews, I will try this product and then will give a review. I hope this works for my dogs. I will give feedback in a few weeks. This is the first time I received the incorrect product.........
customer_reviews.author: skelly

customer_reviews.title: Aids in weight loss
customer_reviews.text: Our pup was one of those that ate and ate and didn't know how to stop. If we didn't feed him food he would eat other things like pups do and he started gaining weight and we didn't know what to do. Then our Vet told us about Science diet and we tried this one and it seems to work. But, we have also had to step up his walks and exercise as well. This food has been our biggest helper. It seems to fill him up not out.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie G.

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for several years but just recently purchased from Amazon. One of the “Features” requested for the ratings was “Flavor”. I didn’t taste it so I can’t rate the flavor. My dog eats it and he’ll eat anything, even his own by product and that can’t taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Cruey

customer_reviews.title: Must have dog food
customer_reviews.text: I love this food for my dogs I get this on a subscription so it just arrives when I'm starting to run low. Ever since I switched my dogs food to hills science diet their coat energy and entire delimer had changed for the better.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Bad business, kibble size changed without notification
customer_reviews.text: Changed kibble size to tiny. My dog will not touch this food now. VERY DISSATISFIED after using this product for so long only to have this switch occur without notification.
customer_reviews.author: Dcashi1

customer_reviews.title: Great size for travel
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food and it maintains his weight well. He really porked-up on another brand. I ordered this size for the final part of a long road trip since, I didn't want to cart the large bag home. I am glad that you had it, but it is not nearly as good a value as buying the large bag.
customer_reviews.author: ET AZ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, fairly priced
customer_reviews.text: I can't coment on the "flavor" (which Amazon asks the buyer to rate) because my dogs aren't talking. However, they gladly eat this kibble so my guess is that they like the taste. My vet recommends this brand and my dogs have always fared well with it. Fairly priced.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this food.
customer_reviews.text: I have a black Lab and they love to eat. As a result, they are prone to become overweight. This is the only "diet" food I have found that my dog loves. All the other brands I tried were rejected by her and she would beg from the table. This food she just gobbles up and it is healthy for her. I will never use anything else unless it is vet prescribed.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN WHITLOCK

customer_reviews.title: good quality food
customer_reviews.text: we used to buy this in another store and with the subscribe and save program it is cheaper. my dog likes the food and she stay healthy. this brand has different foods for the different stages of the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Paco Saenz

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved this food at first unfortunately she did become allergic after several feedings. But that’s just my dog definitely not a reflection of the food. It’s a great dog food for a great price
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food, just follow the feeding guidelines on the bag
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a pit/mastiff mix, 6 years old. Oct 31, 2017 he had gained some pounds and was at 104 lbs and with bad knees, that is not good. (he has a luxating patella) 11 weeks on this dog food and at the vet today Jan.22, 2018 he weighed in at 98 lbs. Vet was very happy with Bruno AND me :) A bag lasts one month for us. and that's at 3-4 cups daily. He has no problem eating it. At all.
customer_reviews.author: Bigtimereadingnerd

customer_reviews.title: I guess it is wrong for me to claim that "I Love It, " but my dog can't type yet
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I guess it is wrong for me to claim that "I Love It," but my dog can't type yet, so I'm writing this for her because she does love it and it really has helped her stay trim. And with a Golden Retriever, that is a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: A. E. Iou

customer_reviews.title: Good quality food.
customer_reviews.text: Hill’s is good quality dog food and this formula helps our senior girl keep her girlish figure in spite of all the human food she gets from her male human (mostly). Her coat is healthy and shiny, she runs and jumps almost like a 2year old and gets great vet checkups. She likes it too!
customer_reviews.author: Oklahoma Lady

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but working for weight loss
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say for certain that the flavor is good as I haven’t tried it, but our dog hasn’t complained and always shows up for meal time. Our veterinarian did adjust the amount we were giving due to the fact that she wasn’t losing weight (but not gaining either), even on the weight loss recommended amount listed on the package feeding grid.
customer_reviews.author: CocoBunny

customer_reviews.title: Hill's Science Diet Dog Adult Perfect Weight
customer_reviews.text: So far we are not seeing any real weight loss. The first bag we got was a smaller bag for sm. dogs. The kibbles were very small and our dog woofed it down. I decided to go for the larger size adult bag (not sm. dogs), larger kibble and he is not wanting to eat all of it at meal times. Since he is such a eater I do not worry about him leaving some. He finally finishes it and it would not hurt him if he didn't. I figure he'll eat when he gets hungry enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Lee

customer_reviews.title: My Shiba Inu loves this dog food!!
customer_reviews.text: My Chubby Shiba Inu boy which is 26.5 lb now, He needs lose weight seriously. And He is a fussy eater especially dry dog food, but so far he loves this.Actually, smells very great to appetizing food. Hope he will lose weight soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Harry Paget Flashman VC, KCB, KCIE

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful. Pug refuses it.
customer_reviews.text: Smells awful and my pug hates it. My pug has never turned down food but he refuses this food. I thought maybe he was for once being finicky but offered it to my son's dog and got the same response. It smells awful. The dog looses weight because cause it has to taste bad if it tastes like it smells. So expensive for cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: pam J

customer_reviews.title: My fat dog finds this food palatable.
customer_reviews.text: My fat dog finds this food palatable, in contrast to the other reduced-calorie foods I tried. And this brand has a reasonably high rating on the websites that analyze dog food. Unless your budget allows you to go into prescription-level weight control dog food, this "science diet" line is an excellent choice. (By the way, while my dog is still pretty fat, on this food he is improving slowly but surely. At least the vet no longer compares me to "Honey boo-boo's mother." Now if only I could get the kids to stop slipping treats to sweet Grover....) Good luck to your chubby friend on his weight-loss journey!
customer_reviews.author: MSWTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: My vet recommended I switch my pitbull to this from Taste of ...
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended I switch my pitbull to this from Taste of the Wild. She had horrible recurring UTIs while she was on Taste of the Wild, and switching her to this food has drastically helped her UT issues. Even though it's not a savings from Taste of the Wild, the improvement in my dog's health is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Tianna A.

customer_reviews.title: ... dog ( slightly overweight Beagle/basset mix ) seems to like this food
customer_reviews.text: My dog ( slightly overweight Beagle/basset mix ) seems to like this food; it smells good and gave him no problems while I transitioned him to it from his regular food. Hopefully he will lose a few pounds over the next few months. Slimmer is healthier! He is about 63 lbs and I would like him in the 50 lb range.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmee

customer_reviews.title: No longer buying because they changed the size to mire like cat food
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely hate the “tasty new kibble” that’s more the size of cat food. Looking for a new food. This is the “new coke” of science diet dog food.
customer_reviews.author: RogerWilco

customer_reviews.title: This dog food is delicious
customer_reviews.text: I eat about a cup and a half a day and it's very delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob stamm

customer_reviews.title: Formula cheapened. Kibble not wanted
customer_reviews.text: The formula was changed. Fillers have been added to cheapen it. Also now kibble which is much smaller pellets not suitable to large dogs. Some bean counter must hand convince the company to ruin this product.
customer_reviews.author: Franco

customer_reviews.title: My Vet Recommends
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommends the perfect weight because I gravity feed. It's great that I can get it from Amazon and the price is almost always cheaper than other sites
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No quality control
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love the food (and I hope so, it’s expensive)... when I reordered a second bag, the kibbles were significantly smaller and harder/different texture. There should not be such a big difference between 2 bags of the same dog food....
customer_reviews.author: jeronimus wolsink

customer_reviews.title: Dog gobbles it up like a filet mignon!
customer_reviews.text: My dog eats this like he's going to the electric chair. Lol And, he lost a few pounds and looks like a lean machine! Good boy :)
customer_reviews.author: Tony EvilDeals

customer_reviews.title: It's not working for her.
customer_reviews.text: She had to have it soaked in water and she has been scratching horrible and she has patches where she has scratched most of the hair off or pulled it out. I hear her a lot just scratching. I don't know unless she's allergent to it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Young

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product and packaging
customer_reviews.text: We have been feeding Hill Science Diet for a few years now and our dogs love it. The packaging has improved as they have added a Velcro type seal. Makes it great for traveling in our RV.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep my dog at a healthy weight.
customer_reviews.text: This keeps my dog near a healthy weight. I feed my dog meat as well. No matter what the dog food companies claim, kibble is not a complete food. My only complaint is that it is very expensive for kibble.
customer_reviews.author: Library Lil

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love this product and continue to thrive. We will continue to purchase this great product and see great results with our dogs weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great food, follow the directions on the bag!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are normally picky when it comes to food, but they love this. It's helped get one that is overweight down a few pounds and the other maintain healthy weight. When switching to this follow the directions including mixing it with the old food first. If you don't your dogs stomach will be upset. Also larger piles of feces and gas is common because of the amount of fiber. I'll continue to give me dogs this food over pedigree garbage any day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting Chemical Odor
customer_reviews.text: This is nothing like the Hills I purchase from my Vet. As soon as I opened the bag, a horrible odor hit me in the face. It smells like chemicals. My dog won't eat it and I don't blame her.
customer_reviews.author: Gail B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have a medium-small mini goldendoodle. We got her fixed years ago & she has put on so much weight that she was unhealthy. I've had her on this food for about 45 days and I can already tell a difference when I pick her up.
customer_reviews.author: HUNTER WOODELL

customer_reviews.title: The label says it all
customer_reviews.text: My dog not only enjoys this food, but she also lost all her extra weight. It took us 4 years to find the perfect balance!
customer_reviews.author: Tumpicka

customer_reviews.title: Great for fat Beagles.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit pricey but well worth it. My piggy beagles love it (as they do almost anything) but because it’s less fattening with careful measuring they are slowly getting to a healthier weight.
customer_reviews.author: Fred T

customer_reviews.title: Dog gets sick
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been eating this Hill's Science Diet "Perfect Weight" food for several years, with no problems. Had previously always purchased in-store from either Petco or PetSmart. My local store was out, so I tried buying online via Amazon. Something must wrong with this batch, because she's "brought it up" after almost every feeding. Likely will not purchase online again.
customer_reviews.author: F C.

customer_reviews.title: Great food.
customer_reviews.text: Great food and appears easily digested. Both my dogs love it and it contains their weight to a healthy level. Recommended by their vet. I’ve tried all kinds of foods and both went to this quickly and eagerly eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Good product for my pup. He likes the food and maintains a good weight when eating this food.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMan

customer_reviews.title: Happy mutts, Happy mom.
customer_reviews.text: I tried nearly a dozen foods trying to find something that agreed with both of my dogs stomachs and that seemed healthy for my babies. I finally landed on the sensitive stomach by hill's science.. I soon after switched them to the perfect weight blend for obvious reasons and both their tummys are still happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley B.

customer_reviews.title: My pup loves it
customer_reviews.text: I havent personally tried this so I can’t say anything about the flavor but my dog has been eating it for 10 years & he hasn’t complained.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Selakoff

customer_reviews.title: My new pet food of choice
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this more then their food they were on before! I read reviews of the smell and it does kind of stink, but my dogs eat it right up. If you're switching to this food, gradually mix it in with the food they already have. I read a lot about it making dogs vomit or giving them runny poos, but I assume that's because their owners didn't transition them into a new food correctly. My dogs love it and their fur looks great and they're already slimming down!
customer_reviews.author: Elysa Krpicak

customer_reviews.title: Great Food
customer_reviews.text: I have always feed Hills Science Diet to all of my dogs, and when I got my male fixed he started gaining weight. I switched him to this and he lost almost 8 pounds and has kept it off.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Rennhack

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 8 yo 90 pound medical response K-9
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 8 yo 90 pound medical response K-9. Use with an auto feeder
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality dog food
customer_reviews.text: Dog always loves this brand. I always think dog food is over priced and this is no different in that respect
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: good value, our Lab liked it
customer_reviews.text: Weight better controlled than what we fed him before. We do alternate with Royal Canin if only because we humans feel a need for variety.
customer_reviews.author: John G. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: New kibble ??? unhappy dog
customer_reviews.text: Very dissapointed , my dog doesnt like this "new tasty kibble" its not even smelly like the past.. not recommended anymore ..
customer_reviews.author: roberto

customer_reviews.title: Good food for weight control.
customer_reviews.text: It has been a good food for controlling our dogs weight. He seems to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve's reviews

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for your dog!
customer_reviews.text: Great food, my dog loves it and was able to lose weight. We continue to use this and she has maintained a healthy weight.
customer_reviews.author: Harley Mom

customer_reviews.title: Dog Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Our Pit Bull really does enjoy her dinner and snacks of kibble! She's reluctant to eat anything else.
customer_reviews.author: AZRider

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love Hill's Science Diet Dry Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it taste great but our dogs are losing weight and actually are more active thanks to Hill's Science Diet Dry Dog Food Adult, Perfect Weight for Weight Management, Chicken Recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bait & Switch with new "kibble"
customer_reviews.text: I reorder this automatically every month. I never got a warning that I was reordering something different. My recent reorder came in and when I poured in my dog dish, it looks like cat food. Dog won't touch it. Don't appreciate it Hill Science. Please make the old stuff available again.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson .E

customer_reviews.title: Same product different photo on packaging
customer_reviews.text: This product changed the picture on their packaging. I had to double check it was what we’ve been ordering the last 4 1/2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Diane S

customer_reviews.title: Happily surprised
customer_reviews.text: So my aging Yorkie needed to be put on diet food because he started gaining some weight especially after we stopped breeding him and had him fixed. I have tried 5 other brands and to say he didn't like them was an understatement. With absolutely no expectation of success, we tried Hill Science Diet and he loved it. He ate the entire bowl. I couldn't believe my eyes. So, definitely 2 paws up from the Helmick household!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Foy

customer_reviews.title: Dog smaller it and would not touch it.
customer_reviews.text: Dogs would not eat it. Cats tried to eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome food-great quality
customer_reviews.text: Luv ththiththis food. My pit/boarder collie was 67 lbs and i mixed it with her food til it was gone and she lost 4.5 lbs in a month. She luves this food Eats it up! I feed her 2 cups per day and she luves it!
customer_reviews.author: corene marshalek

customer_reviews.title: Not for large dkgs
customer_reviews.text: This is not for Large dogs the pieces ar much to small
customer_reviews.author: Lanny Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I like the way it looks compared to the Light
customer_reviews.text: 39.18 if you purchase the monthly subscrition. This is what I feed my Golden Retrievers. I like the way it looks compared to the Light. Seems healthier and the ingredients seem a little better. Could just be my imagination. However, I was paying > $50 at Petco. Now it get's delivered and I don't have to worry about getting it....
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep my dog's weight in check
customer_reviews.text: My dog is mostly inactive and this helps keep her weight in check
customer_reviews.author: pmichael49

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I've always fed Science Diet food to my dog but, bought this version recently to keep his weight in check. Wow! My dog loves this food, and I love how he's 'doing' on this food. I think I have found the perfect food for my dog! .
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: It worked for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My female black lab Sophie is food motivated. She doesn't care at all about toys, just food. She lost weight eating this food. We have also cut back on some treats but I think she finds the food filling enough that she isn't begging to eat more.
customer_reviews.author: Pirate's Mom

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog and all his friends love this dog food!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the dog full and happy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality food. Doesn't seem to be loaded with added dyes for color.
customer_reviews.author: LucilleShimmin

customer_reviews.title: Good food.
customer_reviews.text: I got this food for my over weight Australian Shepard. It’s been really great he has lost weight which was the main goal. I like the size of the food and it has a nice feel to it. Over all he seems to like it but he eats everything.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Bradshaw

product_meta.title: Hill's Science Diet Dry Dog Food Adult, Perfect Weight for Weight Management, Chicken Recipe
product_meta.description:
Size:15 LBPutting your grown dog on a calorie restricted diet can be difficult for you and your canine companion. That's why Hill's Science Diet Perfect Weight Adult Dog Food provides delicious, breakthrough weight management nutrition that your full grown dog can enjoy. With protein for lean muscle maintenance, and clinically proven results in just 10 weeks, this weight control dog food made with natural ingredients is the perfect addition to your adult dog's bowl. This healthy weight dog food is formulated with decades of cutting-edge research to be a great-tasting meal your grown dog can truly enjoy. There’s more to love with the new look of Science Diet. Some of our products also have new names, new kibble shapes & new formulas.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Hill’s Pet Nutrition’s Mission: To help enrich and lengthen the special relationships between people and their pets. 

More than 220 veterinarians, food scientists, technicians and Ph.D. nutritionists at Hill's develop all of Hill's pet foods to meet the needs of your pets. Hill’s only accepts ingredients from suppliers whose facilities meet stringent quality standards and who are approved by Hill's. Not only is each ingredient examined to ensure its safety, we also analyze each product's ingredient profile for essential nutrients to ensure your pet gets the stringent, precise formulation they need.

Hill’s uses only high-quality ingredients including real chicken, lamb or salmon protein. Hill’s dry pet foods have quality protein as the first ingredient and provide clinically proven antioxidant benefits. Plus, they’re made with natural ingredients (plus vitamins, minerals & amino acids) and never contain artificial colors, flavors, preservatives or chicken by-product meal.

Hill’s food, shelter & love program donates food to shelters across the country, providing the proper nutrition that helps pets find their way to loving homes. With every purchase of Science Diet you help feed over 100,000 homeless pets every day, 365 days a year.
feature_bullets: Breakthrough adult dry dog food clinically proven for weight management
Over 70 % of adult dogs lost weight within 10 weeks when fed this safe & effective weight management dog food
Help your grown dog maintain a healthy weight with this dog food
This adult dog food supports muscle maintenance
Made in the USA with global ingredients you can trust

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
